content.text:
- Yep, I just edited it to a maximum of 80 characters locally and the long hashtag works. I wonder why there's a maximum.
- Also yep: I can confirm that the `mentions` array doesn't include `#Ãœ`, since ssb-mentions is using ssb-marked rather than ssb-markdown. Lots of historical context [here](https://github.com/ssbc/ssb-markdown/pull/24) for future scuttle-archaeologists.
